conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["archive", "delete", "get", "unarchive"] AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF action IN ["send_reply", "prefill_message"] THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF action == 'open_url' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete"] AND resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'comment' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF resource == 'comment' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'conversationId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'conversationId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["delete", "get"] AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'messageConversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'thread' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete"] AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'thread' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'thread' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'thread' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'thread' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF resource == 'thread' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
